content: skip 2 sts 2 double_crochet in next 9 sts skip 2 sts 1 single_crochet in next 8 sts 1 half_double_crochet in next 6 sts 2 half_double_crochet chain 1 2 half_double_crochet in next chain 1 space 1 half_double_crochet in next 6 sts 1 single_crochet in next 7 sts join with a slip_stitch to first single_crochet fasten_off 17 single_crochet 16 half_double_crochet 36 double_crochet 1 x chain 1 space round 7 join c2 paper white with a slip_stitch in the first st of last round chain 1 slip_stitch in next st 18 times video help https //youtube com/shorts/okyq4rw-a5y si=klnnptdjwscyn1nx 1 single_crochet spike st in the center double_crochet of the 3 double_crochet group below from round 3 note you don t work into the single_crochet in this round as the single_crochet spike st is enclosing it slip_stitch in next st chain 1 34 times slip_stitch in chain 1 space chain 1 slip_stitch in next st chain 1 15 times join with a slip_stitch to first slip_stitch 1 single_crochet spike st 69 slip_stitch 69 x chain 1 space fasten_off and weave in all ends 3 k a m e crochet designs 2024 by krisztina anna matejcsok-edomer all rights reserved thank you for choosing this pattern for your project when you make it i d like to see it please tag me @k a m e_crochet or use hashtag #kamecrochet on instagram or other social media so i can admire your projects you can also join my facebook group where you can get updates on new pattern releases or help with existing ones if you get stuck https //www facebook com/groups/975632939436008/ ref=bookmarks if you have any questions about the pattern you can also contact me directly at kamecrochet@gmail com or youtube https //www youtube com/channel/uci4snch5kosqzqfrmbzebqq ravelry https //www ravelry com/people/mytia89 facebook https //www facebook com/kamecrochet instagram https //www instagram com/k a m e_crochet happy crocheting 4
